message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering the decreasing value of money. Your previous offer was too generous.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 40/60 split. This aims to balance fairness while accounting for the inflation affecting both parties.
I'm willing to compromise and split the money 50/50, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share given the current market conditions.
